name: Formula Craft
description:
Formula Craft is the first game where you start a race without having a car!

Instructions: Once you open the game, write your name on the box attached for that on the main menu. This will allow you to appear on the leaderboard of the game. Once you do this (and check the controls) you can start the game. 

First, you will start on the looting area, where you will have to find pieces for your car. The pieces are sorted by 3 categories:

Lower tier: GRAY 

Middle tier: BLUE

Higher tier: GOLD

The better your pieces, the best your car will be, as it will be not only faster but also have a better grip or acceleration. But don't lose much time looting, as this time will be part of your final score.

Once you have all your car pieces collected, you will have to find the portal and start racing. You have 5 laps to get the best time possible. Don't try to cheat and exceed track limits, or your time will be deleted!

The total time will make your position in the ranking. Are you on the top-10? Did you beat your friends, or even the designers of the game?
